author: rmcnulty
title: Britney Spears Looks Superfit in Workout Snaps

organizations.name: workout snaps athletes & celebrities britney spears looks superfit

text:
Athletes & Celebrities Britney Spears Looks Superfit in Workout Snaps The pop star has always been known for her active lifestyle, and she's still at the top of her game. Comments 
Britney Spears is one of those celebrities who always seems to be fit, no matter what. She still has us looking on in envy, sharing snaps of her workouts as well as her adorable kids and Pinterest-worthy food. 
Yesterday, the star shared a video of her workout and some snaps of herself looking incredible as usual, making it easy to forget that she's a mom of two. So what does the pop star do to maintain her rockin' physique? She puts in the hard work at the gym. Check her out below knocking out a few reps of this glute-strengthening move. A post shared by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Feb 28, 2017 at 4:07pm PST A post shared by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Feb 28, 2017 at 1:42pm PST 
And the reward for all that hard work is looking like a million bucks when perched on a fence somewhere out on the range. No doubt we'll be seeing more striking poses from the fitness minded celeb. Topics:
